00044 #include "Point3D.h"
00045 #include "Vector3D.h"

00047 Point3D::Point3D( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00048 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00049 {
00050 }
00051 
00052 Point3D::~Point3D( )
00053 {
00054 }
00055 
00056 Point3D& Point3D::operator+=( const Point3D& point )
00057 {
00058     x += point.x;
00059     y += point.y;
00060     z += point.z;
00061     return *this;
00062 }
00063  
00064 Point3D& Point3D::operator+=( const Vector3D& vector )
00065 {
00066     x += vector.x;
00067     y += vector.y;
00068     z += vector.z;
00069     return *this;
00070 }
00071 
00072 Point3D& Point3D::operator-=( const Vector3D& vector )
00073 {
00074     x -= vector.x;
00075     y -= vector.y;
00076     z -= vector.z;
00077     return *this;
00078 }
00079 
00080 Point3D& Point3D::operator*=( double scalar )
00081 {
00082     x *= scalar;
00083     y *= scalar;
00084     z *= scalar;
00085     return *this;
00086 }
00087 
00088 Point3D& Point3D::operator/=( double scalar )
00089 {
00090     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00091     x *= inv;
00092     y *= inv;
00093     z *= inv;
00094     return *this;    
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool Point3D::operator==( const Point3D& point ) const
00098 {
00099         if( this == &point ) return true;
00100     else return( ( x == point.x ) && ( y == point.y ) && ( z == point.z ) );
00101 } 
00102   
00103 bool Point3D::operator!=( const Point3D& point ) const
00104 {
00105         if( this == &point ) return false;
00106     else return ( x != point.x ) || ( y != point.y ) || ( z != point.z );
00107 }
00108     
00109 double Point3D::operator[]( int i ) const
00110 {
00111     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00112     else return (i == 1) ? y : z;
00113 }
00114 
00115 double& Point3D::operator[]( int i )
00116 {
00117     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00118     else return (i == 1) ? y : z;
00119 }

00121 Point3D operator+( const Point3D& lhs, const Point3D& rhs )
00122 {
00123     return Point3D( lhs.x + rhs.x, lhs.y + rhs.y, lhs.z + rhs.z );
00124 }
00125 
00126 Point3D operator+( const Point3D& lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00127 {
00128     return Point3D( lhs.x + rhs.x, lhs.y + rhs.y, lhs.z + rhs.z );
00129 }
00130 
00131 Vector3D operator-( const Point3D& lhs, const Point3D& rhs )
00132 {
00133     return Vector3D( lhs.x - rhs.x, lhs.y - rhs.y, lhs.z - rhs.z );
00134 }
00135 
00136 Point3D operator-( const Point3D& lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00137 {
00138     return Point3D( lhs.x - rhs.x, lhs.y - rhs.y, lhs.z - rhs.z );
00139 }

00141 Point3D operator*( const Point3D& point, double scalar )
00142 {
00143     return Point3D( point.x*scalar, point.y*scalar, point.z*scalar );
00144 }
00145 
00146 Point3D operator*( double scalar, const Point3D& point )
00147 {
00148     return Point3D( point.x*scalar, point.y*scalar, point.z*scalar );
00149 }
00150 
00151 Point3D operator/( const Point3D& point, double scalar )
00152 {
00153     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00154     return Point3D( point.x*inv, point.y*inv, point.z*inv );
00155 }

00157 std::ostream &operator<<( std::ostream &os, const Point3D& pA )
00158 {
00159     os << pA.x << ", " << pA.y << ", " << pA.z;
00160     return os;
00161 }
00162 
00163 double Distance( const Point3D& pA, const Point3D& pB )
00164 {
00165     return ( pA - pB ).Length();
00166 }
00167 
00168 double DistanceSquared( const Point3D& pA, const Point3D& pB )
00169 {
00170     return ( pA - pB ).LengthSquared();
00171 }
